Class Plan

java.lang.Object
edu.uptc.Entidades.Plan
Direct Known Subclasses:
PlanHogar, PlanMovil
public abstract class Plan extends Object
Abstract base class representing a service plan in the system. Contains common attributes for all plan types including pricing, discounts, and acquisition date. Subclasses must implement methods for calculating monthly payments and displaying plan details.

  • Constructor Details

    • Plan

      public Plan(LocalDate fechaAdquisicion, double valorServicio, double descuento)
      Constructs a new Plan with the specified details. Automatically assigns a unique ID using the static counter.
      Parameters:
      fechaAdquisicion - Date of plan acquisition
      valorServicio - Base service value
      descuento - Discount percentage

  • Method Details

    • calcularPagoMensual

      public abstract double calcularPagoMensual()
      Calculates the monthly payment for this plan. Must be implemented by subclasses to define specific calculation logic.
      Returns:
      The monthly payment amount

    • mostrarDetallesPlan

      public abstract String mostrarDetallesPlan()
      Returns a string with the plan's details. Must be implemented by subclasses to provide specific plan information.
      Returns:
      String containing plan details
